Event.name: Pre_transfer
Event.definition: <def-root>The stage before the transfer has taken place, with the <fen>Theme</fen> in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that is about to transfer the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity which is in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The way that the <fen>Recipient</fen> or <fen>Donor</fen> possesses the <fen>Theme</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual who is about to receive the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the Time when the Pre_transfer event occurs. </def-root>
